vision.title: My Vision
vision.text: This choice naturally follows from my BTS SIO SLAM training, and allows me to consider several paths: working in a company or evolving as a freelancer. This flexibility is a major asset for me, as it gives me the freedom to explore different professional contexts.

header.title: Synchronize is an e-learning platform designed to help people learn wide range of new skills with a totally new online experience.
header.description: The project provides an opportunity for lovers of cinema, science and math to get serious experize from the best specialists in these fields in Russia, without interrupting their main work.

gallery.caption: We have more than 100+ online courses to try this year!

content.context_description: The training takes place on its own educational LMS-platform. Unfortunately, there is no mobile application that would make the learning process simple and convenient.
content.solution_description: The app will allow students to watch lectures, courses and communicate effectively without a computer. The schedule that suits your pace.
